description: Simon Cox hangs in a sling as Eddie Moreno starts to get better acquainted with the dark meat dangling in front of him. Cox swallows Moreno's fist with ease and isn't too eager to give it back. Moreno goes deep in the gut with his tattooed forearm - even Moreno seems surprised. After swallowing and spitting out Moreno's big hands, Cox blossoms and lets loose a torrent of worked-up jizz.
title: At Arm's Length 1, Scene #03
